name: National Renal Alliance
overview: As of December 31, 2008, National Renal Alliance, LLC was acquired by Renal Advantage, Inc. National Renal Alliance, LLC owns and operates dialysis facilities in the United States. The company specializes in assisting hospitals in the area of nephrology programs. It provides kidney dialysis services, including hemodialysis, peritoneal dialysis, home hemodialysis, and noctumal dialysis. The company also offers nephrology, dietary and social, and emergency services. It serves partnering physicians, hospitals, clinical staff, patients, and academic institutions. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Franklin, Tennessee. It has facilities in Missouri, Texas, Kansas, Oklahoma, Indiana, Kentucky, Tennessee, Georgia, South Carolina, and Alabama.

acquisition.source_description: Parent Company of Renal Advantage Inc. Completes Acquisition of National Renal Alliance
